name: Circus Royale
description:
Thank you

First, allow me to thank you all! Thank you for looking at this page and thank you for even trying my game. It honestly means a lot to me and I hope you enjoy what you play. And if you don't please feel free to leave me feedback that I can apply to my next game!

Circus Royale is a very simple game that I'm incredibly proud of. I'm glad I stuck to the release date and delivered. Here is to releasing many more games in the future!

Why release this game?

The short answer is simple: failure. I've been so afraid of being a failure or being called a fraud that I've never openly released a game. For the past 10 years of my life I've dreamt of opening a game studio and making unique and inspiring games. During those 10 years I'd tinker and open unity but never fully committed to making a game until now. Why the change of heart? Because I see the amazing things games can do, the myriad of emotions that videogames can make us feel. I want to be a part of that community, making creative, innovative, and ultimately fun experiences that anyone can enjoy.

I'm excited for what's ahead and this game is just the first of many!

Randy Wiafe
Founder, Happy Distraction Studios

Credits

Writing - Chuck Zodl

Images - Midjourney

Sound Effects - Pixabay 

Music - Krampus’s Workshop and Fluffing a Duck by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/
